website_summaries.verdict: A good multi-sport rebounder net that helps improve aim and catching skills.
pros: Meant to sit outside in bad weather without rusting or corroding
Net features a center target to help practice aiming skills
Adjustable to set the desired rebound speed
cons: Net is more rigid and tense than other rebounder options

customer_reviews.title: Great product, crappy instructions
customer_reviews.text: Great product, crappy instructions. My 13 year old and I starting putting it together and everything was going great until the net. Ugh, we put three sides (top, left and right) on and struggled, then gave up. I asked my husband to help and he didn't want to redo everything that we had done after what I read on the other reviews that we did wrong. One look and he said "I've got it" and he grabbed a ratchet tie and used that to pull the net down. My son and I never thought it would fit, but it did. My boys love it. Been playing with it all afternoon. See of the photos of how he did it.
customer_reviews.author: macjac

customer_reviews.title: getting the net on if you don't start in the right place) but it isn't that bad. It's very good quality
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, this can be a bit of a booger to assemble (i.e., getting the net on if you don't start in the right place) but it isn't that bad. It's very good quality, heavy tubing, and super easy to move around for mowing or just changing placement for different activities. My son uses this to kick a soccer ball (which I much prefer to the soccer ball bouncing off the house) and throw a football. It works great for both of those activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bungies I received are questionable size
customer_reviews.text: So far this "rockets" the ball back and is very good. When assembling I found the bungies are so short that I had to make a hook tool to pull them around the frame enough to connect to the net. Definitely not like the picture on the Amazon ad. Pulling these bungies to the maximum stretch, besides being dangerous, must put too much strain on the net. I expect over time to see some failures. I had to pull with the hook tool I made, while holding a foot against the frame, and pulling hard with my other hand on the net, to get the bungy hook on the net. These cannot be the right length.
customer_reviews.author: dagineer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Terrible Instructions - Difficult Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Product itself is excellent but poor instructions and difficulty of assembly caused me to downgrade it. The instructions are poor, The bungees are difficult to attach (it took 2 adults with pliers to accomplish). They give you no instruction as to what order you should attach the bungees. If you just work your way around by the time you get to the 4th side they are absolutely impossible to attach. Had to go to another manufacturer's website and instructions to learn that you should attach the 4 corners first, That worked and our 8 and 10 year olds are enjoying it but it was quite a struggle to assemble. It would have been much easier with decent instructions.
customer_reviews.author: SSP

customer_reviews.title: Netting is extremely hard to install...
customer_reviews.text: We, too, thought we got the wrong net for this product...it appears tiny and takes brute strength to attach to the frame. As a 110 pound female, I never could have attached the netting. You need two strong men/boys, or three people to get the net stretched and attached. However, once attached, the net is top notch, and you will be extremely pleased with the pop off it. My 11 year old son uses it to warm up his arm before pitching practice into a pocket net. Now, he can practice by himself. He loves it; he can stand 25 feet back and the ball pops back to him. high recommend...just need strong arms/hands to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S.

customer_reviews.title: Wanted something that would stand up for 5-10 years. This is it
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great product. Sturdy and heavy. All metal parts are painted to protect against rust. I was looking for something that can stand up for the next 5-10 years of kids. This is it. Gave a 4 star for assembly as they are a bit light. The net was Very difficult (have to stretch it) to put on, used some commenter suggestions and it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Net!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for soccer, okay for lacrosse. I didn’t notice it said color would vary. I actually picked this over another one because I wanted the blue. They sent bright orange. But it’s very solid so I’m still happy with it besides the annoying color. Also, it went together pretty easily. Anyone who had trouble with the net fitting was not doing it right. Just follow the directions.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: ... instead of around which made assembly somewhat flustrating but love the product when completed
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions were lacking in some areas and I had to put the frame thru the cords instead of around which made assembly somewhat flustrating but love the product when completed. Worked well for baseball, softball, tennis and I suspect pickleball and paddle ball. Definitely glad that I got it but watch that first pitch, it can come back at you a lot faster than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: D GIBSON

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk.... Net is WAY too big for the frame! Good luck getting a ball to bounce back to you. I took two squares off the top, one on each side, and one from the bottom. It is still not tight enough!!! It's Brand New!!! Ahhhhh!!!! I either need a new net or a refund... So unhappy... Update: took 4 rows off the bottom and 3 off the side. Probably need to do 4 and 4. I'm just concerned the net will fail since I'm not using the reinforced edge of the net.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for both baseball and soccer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who not only plays baseball big soccer as well. When using it for soccer, he has to make sure to kick the ball up a little bit so it doesn’t just hit the bar but other than that, works great! One of the only nets that I found which could be used for both sports.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to put net on, but worth the effort.
customer_reviews.text: This requires two strong adults to put together. I recommend putting the top and bottom on and then putting the sides on. I was able to put the poles together on my own. The new thought I needed my husband's help. There is no way I would have been able to get the net on the poles on my own. My son was excited to toss his lacrosse ball and play wall ball after it was all put together. Looking forward to much fun and practice.
customer_reviews.author: D. Forman

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just not durable
customer_reviews.text: I am a little league pitcher about 14yrs old, and the net in the middle of the orange circle has all ready broke within 6 months (I throw about 60 ish miles an hour), and it is a pain in the tush to set up the net, took my mother and I about 2 hours to get the net on. Other than that, it’s a great product that I use often, and one of the pitchbacks from this company lasted 3 years. Great addition to anyone that wants to play/practice baseball, soccer, or lacrosse.
customer_reviews.author: Lv2ffly

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: We use this for a lacrosse bounce-back as we wanted something that went all the way to the ground (this is the correct sizing for an actual lacrosse goal). This gives both of my kids the opportunity to practice placement of their shots as well as just simple back-and-forth catching. Pain in the butt to get the net on, but this would go for all tight bounce back nets. YOU WILL NEED TWO PEOPLE but don't let this detour you from purchasing! Good quality at a great price, have already recommended to our other lacrosse friends
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I looked for the right kind of net for my 7 year old son for several months. I finally came across this one, read the reviews and ordered it. IT IS PERFECT! Set up was expected - not difficult but requires 2 people to put the net on. Large net but not heavy to relocate. Easy to adjust. My son can practice pitching, catching, grounders, and popups. We also use it as a backstop. It's a hit with my son and all the neighborhood kids. Quality exceeds the price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Ettner

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality pitch back. Great for older players that throw hard. Can be adjusted for ground balls, fly balls and regular throw. I recommend this product for arm strengthening and control workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Jones

customer_reviews.title: My sons LOVE this pitchback
customer_reviews.text: My sons LOVE this pitchback. It was a bit of a pain to put together, but my husband and I figured it out ok. You need two people to put the netting on. Once together, this is excellent quality. Unfortunately, ours was stolen right out of our backyard just two weeks after our son received it for his birthday, so we recently ordered another. A bit expensive, but worth the money and it's BIG! Also love that you can position it for different purposes...grounders, popups, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L.

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest item
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good size, but difficult to put together. Numbers on poles don’t match the directions and the directions are not very clear. The pins didn’t latch so have to go purchase new ones. The net is not nearly as tight as it needs to be to work for lacrosse.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kids to practice softball, volleyball and soccer. Just about any type of ball will bounce back. Lots of fun and not too difficult to put together. Pulling the net tight is the hardest part.
customer_reviews.author: Hiliary M. Gutsick

customer_reviews.title: Great for lacrosse practice!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made and functional for less than $90. Would have expected it to be priced well over $125 for this level of quality and construction. Heed the other reviewers advice and do yourself a favor by using quick clamps to aid in assembly. Without that piece of advice, assembly would have been frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: brainstem9

customer_reviews.title: Great for Volleyball practice!
customer_reviews.text: I am a single mom, my daughter and I were able to put this net together. We struggled a little with the net because of lack of strength but were still able to get it on and taut. Folds up for storage. My daughter loves this for practicing her volleyball skills. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sum1ino

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised, very durable and high quality..Directions are horrible, but it isnt too difficult to figure out how to assemble. I like that it is easy to fold and transport and it has a large surface area of 6' x 6"
customer_reviews.author: JCCat

customer_reviews.title: but it's the best pitch back for baseball I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Takes some time to assemble...but it's the best pitch back for baseball I've ever used. I bought a multi-pack of weighted baseballs and I found that using one of these heavier balls is easier for me. I don't have to throw quite so hard to get a nice consistent pitchback.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert H.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 13-year-old son got this for his birthday to practice Lacrosse. He loves it! I find that my 18 year old and husband love using it too. The instructions were horrible but they were finally able to figure it out. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A Fox

customer_reviews.title: ... I got what I expected and am overall very happy with the product and the price
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews and I got what I expected and am overall very happy with the product and the price. I gave 4 stars because, although the frame was simple to assemble, attaching all the bungees was a bit of a knuckle-buster. You have to attach 7-9 on each side for best performance. I used my own method for stretching and attaching with some degree of difficulty but I did it alone. But once it's all together it's party time! Works GREAT for baseball and well for soccer and volleyball. I def recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Carlson

customer_reviews.title: but I was a bit disappointed that it didn't last a bit longer
customer_reviews.text: Once we got it together, which was difficult, the net is REALLY tight, my 11 year old used this several times a week last summer. After about two months of use, the net came apart right in the strike zone! I was able to tie the two sections that had come apart so that the ball would bounce back and not go right through the hole at that point, but I was a bit disappointed that it didn't last a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old grandson's birthday. This unit needs two people to put the net on. It was also missing all the hardware. We had to spend $25 for the missing pieces. I am a wiz with instruction manuals but this one isn't well written. All the parts that are there were well marked. I would not recommend this unit to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-Marie W.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the year.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and I to kick soccer balls in. We've also thrown baseballs and the dogs oversized tennis ball into it and it works great. You can adjust the angle to give you grounders or popups. It was tough stretching the net all the way around but we got it. It's super easy to put the frame together since it has the pop button on one end and the hole on the other. Definitely made well and will last a long time if stored correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Kenwa

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best ever. I literally read every review while I ...
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best ever. I literally read every review while I waited for it to arrive. I had no issues with the assy or the instructions. They must have redone them as every tube was labeled and the diagrams were relatively easy to read. Took me about 30 mins total including the net. Do the corners first, then the midsection, alternating sides and you won't have an issue. Net rebounds hard from 50 ft away. Love this thing. I use it more than my kids do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and strengthens ball skills.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for our grandsons. They work great in helping them learn different baseball skills. It’s easy to adjust the angle to change the direction of the ball return.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia J. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to install, and the net is way too loose ...
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to install, and the net is way too loose ... In addition, I bought it $81.99, but the price was dropped to $73.80. Very unhappy ... consider to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase I've made for my kids
customer_reviews.text: This rebounder is incredible! I had worried about how difficult some people said it was to get the net on but while it is difficult it is not impossible by any means and once it is on it works amazingly well. My kids and I have used it for soccer, baseball, and football so far.
customer_reviews.author: DWeb

customer_reviews.title: Best Pitch Back
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for the best possible pitch back this is the one. Net was a little hard to get on but that was expected from the other reviews. It has 5 different positions that give different bounces, line drives and fly balls.
customer_reviews.author: Barry C.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and looks like will last
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and looks like will last. I was hesitant to spend the $30-$40 over the average for this but at the same time I didn't want to spend $60 and be left with something flimsy. Spend the extra - this one's worth it. It is large though. Deduct 1-star for the horrendous and useless directions. Took me about an hour and a half start to finish and i'm fairly handy.
customer_reviews.author: avc723

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Large Adjustable Net, Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit of time to put together (specifically the bungee cords that affix the net), but my 2 softball players love this net. It is huge and does the trick. Folds up for storage, but it is rather large and takes up space.
customer_reviews.author: BossPlaya

customer_reviews.title: very good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. Many toys go by the wayside but he keeps going back to this one. He is 7 and just started travel baseball so he wanted to practice throwing and catching. You can angle it down or up for grounders or pop flies. I know it has the measurements in the description but I was still surprised how big it looked in my backyard. It's big but it's fun, sturdy, and a good value.
customer_reviews.author: MLA

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son has a great time with this. Perfect size. Works well. Not too hard to put together. Looks like it will hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: T Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great size, sturdiness and oversll value
customer_reviews.text: Setup was straightforward in my opinion. Was made much easier as we assembled it during a family get together with multiple adults to help. One person assembly of the net onto the frame would prove difficult I'm sure. Ours did not come with a tool to help. If assembling alone I'd recommend an adjustable clamp to assist. You can't beat the size and sturdiness of the frame in this price range. I looked at many cheaper models at local major retailers that seemed way too light gage to last. I don't anticipate any issues with this model. The net rebound is great and the angle adjustment is very useful. Overall, excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K.

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandkids and I find myself using it the most. It’s very sturdy. I use it with a softball and baseball. It works great with both. Not hard to assemble if you start putting the net on in the midpoint of each side.
customer_reviews.author: George F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Several Sports
customer_reviews.text: Sets up easy. Sturdy and works as desired. We've used it for baseball, lacrosse and soccer so far. Worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Taylor 7

customer_reviews.title: Volleyball player loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son is a varsity volleyball player and he loves it... he uses this every day especially during this isolation due to the coronavirus
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for 8 year old grandson and it will be with him throughout high school I'm sure
customer_reviews.author: Julie Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: a part broke within the first 2 months and I can't contact manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product a great review if there was a way to contact the manufacturer through Amazon. We've only had it 2 months and the button you push in to twist the bar to lower and raise it is broken. It pushed all the way in to the bar and fell into the bar.
customer_reviews.author: tydickson

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty kickback rebounder
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty kickback rebounder. Went together easy however as a tip when you are putting the net on start with the corners, then the middle of the net, then middle f the sides, then fill in the rest. Makes it much easier to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Solid unit. Used at kids practice tonight. Expect to last long time. Assembled solo and bungees were tough but I put corners on first and used a acre driver for leverage on the hunger hooks as I pulled the net toward the hooks. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Maxon

customer_reviews.title: High quality practice net
customer_reviews.text: Great practice net! It took 3 adults about 45 minutes to put together, so admittedly not the easiest directions to follow, but once you get it, it just takes some time. I recommend having a soft mallet handy. Great product though and quick delivery. My son has been using it every day since he got it and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith S

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sons and it is awesome - much bigger and sturdier than the one I had as a kid. its gotten a ton of use with all sorts of balls . hopefully it holds up for years to come
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best helper
customer_reviews.text: We use it for volleyball and it is the most amazing thing. Hours of quality practice.
customer_reviews.author: fallon oconnell

customer_reviews.title: Great Pitchback
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! Hard to assemble. Pictures on instructions do not match product however vendor promptly responded to an email inquiry. Definately need two people for assembly. Once assembled is great. My 9 year old son has used it every day for hours on end for mostly for baseball and some soccer. It's big and has different angles.
customer_reviews.author: Maitsiko

customer_reviews.title: Great for pitching practice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a different rebounder. My daughter is 13 and pitches for a 16U travel softball team. This was a great price for the quality, tool a little time to assemble but was not horrible. SHe love it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this rebounder! My son loves football so we purchased the junior Passback football to go with this as well. We've played for hours with this thing. It is sturdy and adjustable. Great for baseball and football. Our neighbors have even commented on what a great rebounder this is. We would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KHop

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice and play
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a beast to assemble, but my kids have used this almost every day for soccer and baseball.
customer_reviews.author: B. Bergin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together if you read the directions. Great price for a high quality, durable item. My kids love using it for baseball and soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Ash E.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Great Size, Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: My kids are 9 and 7 and they use this pitch back for baseball and soccer in the back yard. They love it. I feel like it was worth the money, it responds great, and I don't have to go out there now every time they want to throw or kick around. It's a bit of a bear to assemble but I hate assembling anything. The parts were all there and the instructions were good enough.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lew

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Works great for baseball and lacrosse. Took two of us about 30-40 minutes to put together and you need strong hands
customer_reviews.author: DMccloskey

customer_reviews.title: The directions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Put it together yesterday. The directions were easy to follow. Make sure you attach the net in the corners before attaching at the sides. Seems to be what they need for lacrosse and soccer. Great for multiple sports.
customer_reviews.author: George Gigous

customer_reviews.title: Great rebounder, with some minuses!
customer_reviews.text: Top quality rebounder, but a royal pain to put together (mostly the net with the bungee cords). Great for ground balls and deep throws from Third Base and Shortstop! The advantages of the rebounder outweigh the pain it was to put together!
customer_reviews.author: JMarti

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: a bit tough to get the net on, but worth it. solid construction!
customer_reviews.author: JohnB

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Our son ordered this and it is very sturdy and large. Much more affordable than some of the others that are smaller. So far, we are very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Big and heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, nice and heavy duty. Hope it lasts a long time. One of my pipes didn’t match exactly so the pin doesn’t click in but not too big of an issue. Little tricky to get netting on, not very good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: parts didn't seem to go together well. I have difficulty adjusting one piece as it kinda came bent
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Play by yourself or others.
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to get the bungies attached. Probably would’ve been easier with another person. The rebounder works great with soccer and baseballs. Kids love it for fun, too.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and hopefully durable
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and seemingly well made. Will see how it stands up to being left outside. Getting the net on takes some hand strngth (to pull the bungee cords tight) but overall easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: P Hines

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: By far the best pitch back we've ever had. Four times the size of those old pitch backs we had as kids. Even the last one I bought a few years ago was small, fell over easily, or dented when you hit one of the poles. This has very solid construction. My kid loves it. I use it sometimes to warm up my arm before one of my games.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good value and very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This setup is much stronger and stable than others we have owned. I think it will hold up much better as long as you don't leave it in the elements all the time. Took my 13 year old and my self about 30 min to set up. A little tricky, especially the net, but not too bad. Only complaint is that as well as the main pieces were wrapped and packaged, we still had several that were scratched to the metal and now need to be sealed. Also you end up scratching paint off when putting it together. But am very pleased with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Easley

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Nice size. I am very pleased! The elastics are very hard to install. We figured out a method that works well. Using a pipe or broomstick (threaded through a net square) as a lever against the ground...stretch net as another person fastens the elastics.
customer_reviews.author: tiggergal77

customer_reviews.title: satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: We are having great fun with this product, my two kids set it up themselves with a little help from grandpa.
customer_reviews.author: Brady D. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Loss of a star because two holes didnt line up for pins. Drilled new hole. Expect two people to pull net tight but you need that tightness for bounce back. Works great. Still would recommend based on how heavy duty and its perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Christine DiBenedetto

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: It was all beat up and missing the entire assembly kit.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old grandson loves his sports net and has even brought it indoors to use in the winter. Sturdy and functional!
customer_reviews.author: Bird Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase. Had to replace another one we bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase. Had to replace another one we bought a couple of years ago......this one is THE BEST.......highly recommend to anyone whose child has a heart for baseball.
customer_reviews.author: Just A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Solid rebounder
customer_reviews.text: Great for soccer - my son loves his new rebounder. Took a bit of effort to put together - may 45 minutes. Definitely helps to have two people.
customer_reviews.author: alsaxe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to string the net but we got it and it works well
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my teenage son. This is much better than the standard pitch backs. The sturdy construction allows it be free standing, no need to hold it down with stakes or bricks it does not budge even when throwing hard against it. The massive 6x6 ft net is plenty for using for long toss. The angles adjust very easily even a teen can do it. Folds easy and stores flat. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mullway

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing similar products, we went with this so my 9 yr old son could throw baseballs as well as kick soccer balls at it. Others seemed too small for soccer. It does work better for baseball, though. Was a little time consuming to put together, but isn't everything. Solid construction. Does not tip over. Net shoots back the balls well. Adjusts easily enough. This product did not have any reviews but we went with it anyway. We got a bucket of baseballs and he can play catch and practice pitching by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Edog

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is very high quality and well worth the money! My son uses it for baseball and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Rebounder!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together.. easy to adjust height/angle. My kids and husband love using it. I would highly recommend this rebounder
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easy to assemble. My son loves it! Great product
customer_reviews.author: pjofpinnulia

customer_reviews.title: Has a great bounce back to practice his catching too
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this everyday. Has a great bounce back to practice his catching too.
customer_reviews.author: kamie kelley

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Rebounder
customer_reviews.text: Such a great item to have. Now our daughter can practice her lacrosse skills on her own (I am not a great training partner). She uses it almost every day that it isn't raining. She even used it in the snow. It took two people an hour or so to put together, but we were being very deliberate and couldn't quite agree on the best way to attach the net. Since this is getting her out of the house and away from electronics, we consider it one of our best purchases. Just wish we had a bigger yard!
customer_reviews.author: Encyclopedia Mom

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Pitchback
customer_reviews.text: Great pitchback for an older child as it really has a kickback vs. the smaller, older one we had. It took two adults to assemble because the rubber rings around the edge are hard to pull around bar and then the net. Worth the work.
customer_reviews.author: Kim N.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: The EZGoal is very durably constructed and intelligently designed. I am very confident that it will last through many years of heavy use. The goal easily collapses flat for storage and is easy to move and handle.
customer_reviews.author: William F Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for baseball and soccer. My 11 yr old son and 12 yr old daughter can run drills.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good rebounder. Build gets tricky at the end. Net gets really hard to stretch, but once it's done it is great to use.
customer_reviews.author: jeanine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! We had no issues putting it together.
customer_reviews.author: T.Sundari108

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Amazing spring to the net. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Keohane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids. ..and parents
customer_reviews.text: Thus product was just what we were looking for after going thru a couple of cheap ones..Quality product with many different options
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Balfe

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality pitch back. Very happy that I choose this one over the cheaper options available. I would recommend this product to anyone. My sons love using it as a "catcher" when playing mock games in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: teenage soccer phenoms use it for chest volleys and for working on first touch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. It is very big with a large surface area. Kids love it and it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe52

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made product. Very sturdy and durable. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CountryCouple

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my grandson and he has not ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he has not had an opportunity to use it yet. It appeared to be very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Jere Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed. Easy to assemble. Not unattractive in the yard. Kids use it for soccer and lacrosse.
customer_reviews.author: Picky1

customer_reviews.title: Net too small
customer_reviews.text: Net just didn’t fit the frame, even when stretched. My son was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: great size.  great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good net. Great size. Easy to change the angle.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Not for smaller kids
customer_reviews.text: This net is more high school or higher level. The net is very rigid, and the ball bouces back very quickly. You have to throw it quite hard to get a rebound. I would suggest a 12 year old would enjoy it. I was looking for a "Pitch Back" like I had when I was in 3rd grade. This is way overkill.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is not easy to adjust to different settings
customer_reviews.text: It is difficult to put together and the directions are not that clear... It is not easy to adjust to different settings..
customer_reviews.author: Lauren I Lake

customer_reviews.title: Too difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: The main reason we don't like it is the difficulty in putting it together and the fact that my son still can't use it because we can't get all the bungees secured properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mainetastic

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Broke after 3 days of use by my 8 year old. Again, wish it could be returned. Three different holes in strings in just three days. Do NOT waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: EJ Guru

product_meta.title: EZGoal Multi-Sport Folding Rebounder Net, 6 x 6-Feet, (Color may vary)
product_meta.description: Promote your name by improving your aim with the EZGOAL Steel Folding Pitching Throwback. This first-class training tool will quickly perfect your shot with its easily adjustable tilting rebounder that fires high pops, grounders and line drives. It's built from optimum materials to ensure longevity throughout your career. The stable 1. 5-inch-thick, 18 gauge steel frame has UV-protected netting that won't deteriorate when left in the elements. Why would you leave something this exceptional out in the rain when its Rock Solid folding mechanism allows you to keep it anywhere ?. .
feature_bullets: Easily adjustable tilting throwback for high pops, grounders and line drives
1. 5" powder coated 18 gauge steel frame with rigid construction
Patent pending Rock Solid folding mechanism for storing flat
Heavy duty plastic/nylon UV treated net

specifications.Manufacturer: New England Outdoor Products LLC - EZGoal
